1.1: The elder to the chosen lady and her children, whom I love in truth, and not I alone, but also all who know the truth,
1.2: for the truth they dwelled in us, and it will be with us forever.
1.3: be with us, grace, mercy, peace from God the Father, and from Jesus Christ the Father's Son, in truth and love.
1.4: I was very glad that I was found among your children walking in truth, as we received a commandment from the father.
1.5: And now I ask you, lady, not as a new commandment to write to you, but what we had from the beginning, that we should love one another.
1.6: and this is love, that we walk according to his commandments; this is the commandment, as you heard from the beginning, that you walk in it.
1.7: because many plans have gone out into the world, those who do not confess Jesus Christ coming in the flesh; this is the plan and the antichrist.
1.8: you see yourselves, so t cfhat you do not lose what we worked for but receive a full salary.
1.9: whoever goes ahead and does not remain in the teaching of Christ has no god; he who remains in the teaching, he has both the father and the son.
1.10: if he comes to you and does not bring this teaching, do not receive him into your house and do not say hello to him;
1.11: for he that sayeth unto him joy partaketh of his works unto the wicked.
1.12: Many things I have written for you have not been written on paper and ink, but I hope they will come to you and be spoken from mouth to mouth, so that our joy may be fulfilled.
1.13: It is taken from the children of your sister the chosen one.
